member.summary: Static class for managing console stuff

member.summary: Starts a process with the given startinfo

member.summary: Runs an exe at the given path with the given args and returns the FINAL result to a string
member.param: The path of the application to run
The working directory of the command
member.returns: The full STD out as a string

member.name: T:Penguin.Console.ProcessResult

member.summary: Results from the standard error stream

member.summary: Results from the standard output stream

member.name: P:Penguin.Console.ProcessResult.StreamRead
member.summary: If true, the output and error streams were definitely fully read. If false, they may still have been but theres no guarantee because the closing characters were not found during the timeout period.

member.name: M:Penguin.Console.ProcessResult.ToString
member.summary: The output stream if exit code 0, otherwise the error stream
